title: Kingsleybello100
author: Kingsleybello100
content: It's always an exciting feeling to grasp whenever you wake up to see your favorite token outperforming everyone's expectations in a time when a lot of investors are flooding socials with -99% portfolio loss due to the dips and rug pulls. A great project is driven by fundamentals that have been tested over and over again to check for possible loopholes before deployment for public use, but not by hype, organised influencers collaborations to ensure that they stay number one on the trending tables and drive price to an insanely high position that majority when eventually jump on.BLUESHIFT Blueshift $BLUES created and deployed Defi 2.0 protocols providing capital efficient features never experienced before since the creation of DeFi 1.0 that was accompanied with problems like high slippage tolerance, high impermanent loss,Â  cost of joining liquidity pools and yield farms. By solving all the problems, it meant the dawn of a new era in the decentralized finance ecosystem. Deployed on the Cardano's Milkomeda a multi chain smart contract platform supporting EVM, Blueshift is currently ranking second largest Total Value Locked (TVL) AMM DEX. This project is still the most underrated low cap project,, the core team won't stop building, at $100 per $BLUES the project will still be considered as underrated.SHIFTERS!SHIFTERS are a community of both investors and enthusiasts in this grand breaking innovation, we support and celebrate the protocols that has ushered us into the future. We are not driven by the price of every $BLUES in the market but the tech that is changing our day-to-day socioeconomic lives.. Blueshift keeps melting hearts and we won't slow down on the energy will share while supporting $BLUESLet's go SHIFTERSLearn more about https : // blueshift .fi
